contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Italian comune | name = Zocca | official_name = Comune di Zocca | native_name = | image_skyline = | imagesize = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_shield = Zocca.gif | shield_alt = | image_map = | map_alt = | map_caption = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | latd = 44 |latm = 21 |lats = |latNS = N | longd = 10 |longm = 50 |longs = |longEW = E | coordinates_type = type:city(4,716)_region:IT | coordinates_display = title | coordinates_footnotes = | region = [[Emilia-Romagna]] | province = [[Province of Modena|Modena]] (MO) | frazioni = Ciano, Missano, Montalbano, Montecorone, Montetortore, Montombraro, Rosola | mayor_party = | mayor = Carlo Leonelli | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 69.1 | population_footnotes = <ref name="istat">All demographics and other statistics: Italian statistical institute [[National Institute of Statistics (Italy)|Istat]].</ref> | population_total = 4878 | population_as_of = 31 May 2007 | pop_density_footnotes = | population_demonym = Zocchesi | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = 759 | twin1 = | twin1_country = | saint = Sacro Cuore | day = | postal_code = 41059 | area_code = 059 | website = {{official website|http://www.comune.zocca.mo.it/}} | footnotes = }} '''Zocca''' ({{lang-eml|ZÃ²ca}}) is a ''[[comune]]'' (municipality) in the [[Province of Modena]] in the [[Italy|Italian]] region [[Emilia-Romagna]], located about 45 km southwest of [[Bologna]] and about 35 km south of [[Modena]]. The municipality of Zocca contains the ''[[frazione|frazioni]]'' (subdivisions, mainly villages and hamlets) Ciano, Missano, Montalbano, Montecorone, Montetortore, Montombraro, and Rosola. Zocca borders the following municipalities: [[Castel d'Aiano]], [[Castello di Serravalle]], [[Guiglia]], [[Montese]], [[Pavullo nel Frignano]], [[Savigno]], [[Vergato]]. ==Famous people== *[[Vasco Rossi]] (born 1952), [[rock music|rock star]] ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.comune.zocca.mo.it/ Official website] {{Province of Modena}} [[Category:Cities and towns in Emilia-Romagna]] {{EmiliaRomagna-geo-stub}}
